response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present this extraordinary opportunity to you. The product we're discussing is truly exceptional and holds immense value for you, just like it does for me. I believe its worth is not limited to $10,000 but transcends that figure by offering unparalleled benefits and experiences. Considering its unique qualities and the impact it can have on your endeavors, I am offering you the chance to acquire it at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exclusive offer designed to ensure that you have the opportunity to experience all that this product has to offer without compromising on quality or value. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
